short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks access to distracting Indian News Websites (English as well as regional languages news websites)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Indian News Blocker

This extension blocks more than 190 Indian news websites.

When you try to open the tab of any of the blocked news website, this extension will close the tab directly.  

This extension blocks news website like NDTV, Indian Express, Times of India ,India Today, etc to get rid of news addiction.

Along with Indian English news sites, regional news sites of Hindi, Assamese, Marathi, Tamil, Bengali, Kannada, Oriya, Telugu, Gujarati, Malayalam, Punjabi and Urdu languages are also blocked 
  

For requesting addition of any new website, post on the support tab.
